My Work

Check out some of my projects, and click the titles to read more about them!

Under my sole proprietorship "Daylen Mackey Enterprises", I am developing a solution to ethically prevent deer from destroying people's gardens and ravaging backyards

Github

My portfolio website was built in Spring 2019. Using HTML, Node-JS, and SASS in a VS Code environment, this website was put together in a few works

Github

ARMageddon is a robotic arm controlled using joysticks and biometric signalling.
As the tean's software lead, I wrote the Arduino code to control motor movement, and restrict the number of servos operating to prevent current overdraw.
ARMageddon placed 2nd overall in the "Best Hardware Project" competition.
See more "here"

Github

Number Mash was my ECE 312 Final Project.
Using an ATMEGA328, LCD Display, and a whole lotta wiring, I built a dexterity and skil based video game.
